title: Women wearing the mask as a niqab - Assim al hakeem
transcript: she's permitted to show her eyes not her eyes let's lots of women wear the nikab like this showing their nose bone their eyebrows their cheeks from here some of them even were only the face mask which exposes most of the face this is not in a cup this is not covering the face who are you fooling he said no no i'm covering the face i'm wearing the cup i'm wearing the mask are you fooling allah do you think allah azzawajal can be fooled like this don't you know you're going to stand in front of him and to answer for such justification and lame excuses you're giving fear allah
